thread.title: The Walt Disney Company Executives to Discuss Fiscal Second Quarter 2018 Financial Results via Webcast

author: cnbc.com
title: The Walt Disney Company Executives to Discuss Fiscal Second Quarter 2018 Financial Results via Webcast
text:
BURBANK, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) will discuss fiscal second quarter 2018 financial results via a live audio webcast beginning at 4:30 p.m. EDT / 1:30 p.m. PDT on Tuesday, May 8, 2018.
Results will be released after the close of regular trading on May 8, 2018.
To listen to the webcast, please visit www.disney.com/investors . The webcast presentation will be archived.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180330005049/en/
The Walt Disney Company
Lowell Singer
